properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 5:59PM MST until January 8 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of up to 9 inches in the mountains, with 3 to 6 inches at pass
level and up to 3 inches at lower elevations. Winds gusting as
high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
